content.question: A decrease in the policy rate accompanied by a decrease in income taxes will result in which of the following in the short run?

choices.label: A decrease in the price level
A decrease in the natural rate of unemployment

topic.text: 5.1: Fiscal and Monetary Policy Actions in the Short Run

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Determine the outcome of an economic situation using economic concepts, principles, or models.
